title: Talk it over
creator_credit: Brereton Porter and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: This film, produced for adult education, illustrates the importance of the free interchange of information and ideas in the maintenance of a free society. The object of the film is to encourage logical method in the examination of ideas and in the clear formulation and definition of points at issue.
